games.name: Pixel Art Top Down - Basic

games.description: Files contain a Unity package and extracted textures for use in other engines.

achievements.name: Legendary Status
achievements.description: Achieve a level of greatness that is truly legendary!

achievements.name: Treasure Hunter
achievements.description: Uncover all hidden treasures in the game!

achievements.name: Master Strategist
achievements.description: Outsmart every enemy with your brilliant tactics!

achievements.name: Social Butterfly
achievements.description: Make friends with every NPC in the game!

games.name: Mystic Woods
games.author: Game Endeavor
games.description: Create the cutest 2D games with this top-down RPG asset pack!

achievements.name: Ultimate Victory
achievements.description: Defeat the final boss without taking any damage!

achievements.name: Speed Runner
achievements.description: Complete the game in record time!

achievements.name: Perfectionist
achievements.description: Achieve 100% completion in all game challenges!

achievements.name: Trivia Master
achievements.description: Answer all trivia questions correctly in the game!

games.name: Pixel Adventure
